Conditions for access:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Remote access (e.g. from home or outside secure perimeter ODC) is not allowed.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To reach Customer environments, end user equipment (PC, laptop) are connecting via network ports placed inside Bridgewater Malaga account premises. Connections to Customer environments outside Bridgewater Malaga account premises not allowed.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bridgewater Malaga account member can reach Customer environments using specific VLAN created for of Bridgewater Malaga account. Site-to-Site VPN is used.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Exclusions for such rule are possible only if agreed with Customer in formal.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7.2.2. Procedure for access granting and access revocation:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ODC Infrastructure support team responsible for providing and revoking an Access to employees and visitors. On receiving the card, the visitor and the ODC Infrastructure support team member makes the corresponding record in the Visitors Access cards registry. On completion of their stay, the visitor or the employee organizing the visit must return visitor's access card to the ODC Infrastructure support team and make the corresponding record in the Issued Visitors Access card registry that the Access card has been returned /visit5.4. Access to EPAM environments, tools and storages\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Access control rules defined in
